name: Cubeformer
description:
A platformer game I started when I was 9, Remade with modern tools and music by ASTRONIC.

This game isn't the best it could be - It's the game I would've made when I was 9 had I not quit in the middle. For example, I purposely drew all the graphics, instead of asking someone more talented to do so, and kept I the assets from the original game.
It was quite the learning experience - I learned how to do so much from making the game:
Pause menus, custom controls, correct aspect ratios...
I learned it all because of this. Some are implemented quite poorly, (In the code side of things)
but they gave me a general idea of what I need to do which I will surely use in future games.

That being said, I hope you can still enjoy the game.

Some info:

The game is made with GameMaker Studio 2.

I added the last bits of code on the 9th of October, 2020, Which is the day I am writing this and the day I am releasing the game.
The modern verison of the game started development on the 1st of December, 2019.

If you have any criticism about the game, Feel free to comment about it, but keep in mind the game is kinda bad in a few areas so it would really be the continuation to the game I made when I was 9, As if I never abandoned it.

A few notes:

1. If you get a white screen and the title screen music plays, Just alt + tab out of the application and back in.

2. If you for whatever reason want this game ported to Linux or Mac, and you have a system running one of the OSes, Contact me via Discord (Skirlez#5521) or Twitter (@Skirlez3).
